name: Raterintyc Scape
description:
A small game created for "Escuela de Organización Industrial(EOI)" course in "Creación de videojuegos y E-Sports en Unity".

The game is a platformer inspired by metroidvanias, this game consist in finding and closing three valves, thus allowing the opening of a door that allows you to change stage.

CREDITS:

Alfonso Cupido

David Luengo

David Santos

Jonathan Cantero

Maria Cabrera

Pablo Garrido
